channel.title: [PI] DDS Special need help!
channel.description: So right now every dds special takes away 30% of the special when I want it to take away 25% which file deals with special attacks so I can change it. would really appreciate any help.

item.title: [PI] DDS Special need help!
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Combatassistant.java

Replace yours with this.

case 1249: case 1215: case 1231: case 5680: case 5698: case 1305: case 1434: if (c.specAmount >= 2.5) { c.specAmount -= 2.5; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(weapon); return true; } return false;

Read full topic
